# sds-switch-field



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property      | Attribute     | Description                                   | Type      | Default |
| ------------- | ------------- | --------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `checked`     | `checked`     |                                               | `boolean` | `false` |
| `description` | `description` | A secondary label below the input             | `string`  | `''`    |
| `disabled`    | `disabled`    | Disables the switch input                     | `boolean` | `false` |
| `error`       | `error`       | An error message that appears below the input | `string`  | `''`    |
| `label`       | `label`       | The switch label                              | `string`  | `''`    |
| `required`    | `required`    | Marks the switch as required                  | `boolean` | `false` |
| `value`       | `value`       | The value of the switch                       | `string`  | `''`    |


## Events

| Event        | Description                        | Type                                                |
| ------------ | ---------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------- |
| `sds-change` | Emitted when the switch is toggled | `CustomEvent<{ checked: boolean; value: string; }>` |
